articles.title: ŠKODA unveils its new logo, colours and future identity - ŠKODA Storyboard
articles.description: After many years, ŠKODA is changing its logo. The new design emphasises the name, while making strong use of two new green communication colours.
articles.content: In addition to the new graphic design, the branding has undergone other changes. The company will now use the KODA name and traditional winged arrow in a ring more separately, with the name becoming … [+837 chars]
